title.rendered: The Vine Rant: Insights from the Inside – The Future of the Mortgage Broker Industry

content.rendered: Peter Aceto, President of Mortgage Alliance, chats with Hugo Dos Reis about his transition from the banking world to the broker world. Together they discuss the reasons why more Canadians should be using a mortgage broker, how technology plays a role in improving the mortgage experience for both brokers and clients and where the mortgage industry is headed in the near future. Watch until the end for Peter’s advice on how to make the most of the year ahead.

Together they discuss the reasons why more Canadians should be using a mortgage broker, how technology plays a role in improving the mortgage experience for both brokers and clients and where the mortgage industry is headed in the near future. Watch until the end for Peter’s advice on how to make the most of the year ahead.
